categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Sock-Headed Worm People, as called by the Sullustan Bungo Bung, were a sentient species that lived on a small planet orbiting a red star near Sullust in the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Their planet's axis was tilted at nearly ninety degrees, so the Sock-Headed Worm People inhabited the narrow band between the planet's light and dark sides, scattering the area with small city mounds. Members of the species were bipedal and had four arms.

During the time of the Galactic Civil War, Bungo Bung encountered a hunting party of Sock-Headed Worm People riding carnivorous beasts. The Sullustan would later refer the the species as the "Sock-Headed Worm People" in his captain's log.
